title: Yamaneko Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Japanese, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Yamaneko, meaning "mountain cat," is an artsy cafe by the water. Offers a vegan plate as one of the dinner sets - it includes miso soup, locally grown rice, and a variety of Japanese vegetables. Has vegan cake. Menu is in Japanese, staff speak limited English. Directions: On the road by the river, south of the Shopping Arcade, beside the Royal Hotel. From JR Onomichi Station south exit and walk east along Route 2 (the street in front of the station) for 15 minutes, turn right at second traffic light and walk past the covered shopping arcade street to the street on the river.
